name: Consensus Voting
description: A simple yes-no vote procedure: if the number of yes votes is greater than or equal to the minimum required, the proposal is passed. If the number of no votes is greater than or equal to the maximum allowed, the proposal is failed. Otherwise, the proposal is still in progress.

check.name: main

variables.name: users
variables.label: Who should be eligible to vote
variables.prompt: An empty value represents that all people in the channel are eligible to vote. If there are multiple users, separate them by commas

variables.name: minimum_yes_required
variables.label: How many number of yes votes are required to reach success

variables.name: maximum_no_allowed
variables.label: How many number of no votes are allowed before we call a failure

variables.name: vote_message
variables.label: Message to be posed in the channel when the vote starts
variables.default_value: Start a yes-no vote: vote with :thumbsup: or :thumbsdown: on this post.

variables.name: vote_channel
variables.label: Channel to post the vote message
variables.prompt: If empty, the vote message will be posted in the same channel as the action

name: Benevolent Dictator
description: A benevolent dictator has the final say on all proposals. The dictator can either approve or reject a proposal through a DM with the bot.

check.name: main

variables.name: decision_message
variables.label: What messages the dictator should be prompted with to make a decision
variables.default_value: Please make a decision on this proposal by yes-or-no voting

variables.name: notify_message
variables.label: What messages should we notify other community members when the dictator is asked to make a decision
variables.default_value: We have asked the dictator to make a decision on this proposal

variables.name: notify_channel
variables.label: Which channel should we notify other community members about the decision

name: Board Voting
description: Community members of a specified role, i.e. a Board, can vote on a proposal. The board can either approve or reject a proposal through either a designated moderation channel or mpim with the bot.

check.name: main
check.codes:
if not proposal.vote_post_id:
	return None
yes_votes = proposal.get_yes_votes().count()
no_votes = proposal.get_no_votes().count()
proposal.data.set("yes_votes_num", yes_votes)
proposal.data.set("no_votes_num", no_votes)
if(yes_votes == 1 and no_votes == 0):
	return PASSED
elif(yes_votes == 0 and no_votes == 1):
	return FAILED
return PROPOSED

variables.name: board_role
variables.label: Which role do board members have

variables.name: decision_message
variables.label: What messages board members should be prompted with to make a decision
variables.default_value: Please make a decision on this proposal by yes-or-no voting

variables.name: notify_message
variables.label: What messages should we notify other community members when board members is asked to make a decision
variables.default_value: We have asked the board to make a decision on this proposal

variables.name: notify_channel
variables.label: Which channel should we notify other community members about the decision
